name: Bedugul Traditional Market
address: Jl. Kebun Raya No.7, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: You can try small fruits before buying and if you buy a big fruit like durian, they cut for you and let you eat there. It was not bad when eating but durian made me sick rest of the day. My favorite was snakefruit. I also bought a rattan bag here and I love it. Local people in the market can speak English very well and they are helpful.
review 2:
Lovely market!
You can buy different types of chips, the green leafs üçÉ one are so good üëå, peanuts, spices, strawberries üçì , flower seeds, orchids and bonsai.
You can bargain around 30-40% max. if you buy more stuff.
review 3: Fresh market mostly fruits, vegetables and some clothes shop on the back. The fruits shop are very nice. Clothes sellers make us feel uncomfortable a bit by their pressure
review 4: Some of the products are not as marketed but you can find good priced items if you look at the right shop and bargain.
review 5:
I love the colors of the fruits and the veggies in this market. But what I don't like is the seller kind of annoyed. All of them call to buy to buy. Hmmm I can't think focus which 1 that I want to buy. I wanna have a look what's there if I like I can buy.
But I stayed maybe 5 minutes only. Bough strawberry then leave.

name: Bedugul Lake View Residence A-1, A-2, B-6 - owner
address: Candikuning, Baturiti, Tabanan Regency, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
One of the worst experiences in this villa. We faced several issues here. Very uncooperative and rude behavior of the staff lady. Severewater clogging issue in the kitchen which made it really difficult to even stand for cooking.  Broken dispenser, no hot water in the washrooms, dirty and poor quality beddings and mattresses
Refrigerator smelled like trash. Kitchen shelves with cutlery smelled rotten. Fortunately, we carried some of our own utensils which helped.We stayed for two nights but there was no cleaning service provided on any day.If you are looking for a comfortable and peaceful stay we would say a big 'no'. It is not at all worth  1.2 million per night. One might find much better Villas at this cost.
review 2:
Not a good one with the price of 1.2 million per night.
Outdated and worst of experience..
Rooms have no windows,bathrooms are old and outdated.

name: Warung Rekreasi Bedugul
address: Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: Food was nice but oh man‚Ä¶ the amount of flies is horrific. Can‚Äôt even eat our lunch in peace because we spent most of the time trying to swat flies away from our food, faces, hands and ears!!! Maybe get a electric fly trap so we can have a more pleasant experience üòê
review 2:
Surprisingly, the place is beautiful and boasts an astonishing, breathtaking view of the lake and the forest-clad mountains.

The food is excellent, and they even have a fireplace to keep you warm as the night air gets chilly.

I would love to come back again and highly recommend it!
review 3: Great little place in the middle of nowhere‚Ä¶ If you find yourself up here, this is the place to go . Sweet staff, ok food
review 4: Good food and nice place surrounding by nature. Nice view during the day. They have accomodation as well and good place for outing. One of restaurant in this area that open until 9 pm or sometimes till late.
review 5: Food was ok. But too many peoples smoking spoiled my appetite.

name: Villa Bedugul lake view inn
address: Jl. Kebun Raya, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: If I could give 0 stars I would, mould in ALL our rooms, unusable kitchen, broken beds and foul smell. Should not be listed as a place to stay. Thankfully only spent one night here. DO NOT BOOK
review 2: Good place for group/family stay. Strategic area (near with some of famous tourist place in Bedugul). They have complete facilities (kitchenette, game room, fast WiFi connection, smart TV with big screen) and the interior feels like home. This is the right place for refreshing with affordable price. Really recommend!
review 3:
Pretty hard to find, but cozy and nice. I can't find any hanger in my room or outside to hang my wet blanket. Surrounded by a Masjid in the west and a Muslim orphanage in the north so it's kinda noisy if they pray with their speakers.
It's very cool in here so don't forget to bring your jacket and socks.
review 4: Wonderful place, newly renovated.. big screen TV available.  You can cook and enjoy barbeque outside.  Water heater available, easy to communicate with landlord.
review 5: Beautiful scenery can be enjoyed here. The weather was so cold and there is a big mosque here, so for muslim traveler, you guys don't need to worry about it. And also, of course there are so many seller that offer many kind of local souvenirs of Bali such as clothes, keychain with cute characters on it, local fruits, mukena (cloak to covering woman's body and head worn at prayer) and many more.

name: Chakra Tavern
address: Candikuning, Baturiti, Tabanan Regency, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: I absolutely loved this place!! I wish I could have stayed longer, the rooms, bathroom, and amenities are fantastic, the cozy lounge area with books and blankets were so welcoming, and of course the amazing big rooftop terrace where I was able to do a work out and hang out in a hammock enjoying the pleasant city sounds and mountain views. The ambiance of this place was just amazing and I wanted to stay longer if my schedule had allowed, and the owner, staff, and food was also great too! Nice place to stay if wanting to check out the temple and waterfalls for a few days in the mountains of Bali
review 2: Manik, Ery, Putu & Elena were wonderful hosts providing every possible comforts. Such a guest oriented place where every needs and wants are provided for, a Premium homestay/hostel environment. Cushy super single bed with surprise 2Pillows &heavy blanket to combat chilly weather. Warning....once you snuggle between those sheets, it's a tough struggle to get up and out. Had my best sleep of the year there. Thank you for a welcoming environment, far surpassing any expectations!
review 3:
I absolutely loved staying at Chakra Travern.
The owner is an angel who deeply cares about her guests. I haven't experienced this kind of loving hospitality since traveling in New Zealand 20 years ago.

The building has huge open common areas, a nice garden and an incredible roof terrace with amazing views of the mountains. There's plenty of space for your morning workout or yoga session. Don't let you fool by the old school looks. Believe me, there's a magical and kind energy in these walls that will embrace you once you have entered.

During my stay the people who arrived and left were all very conscious and open. People actually talked to each other instead of just staring at their phones.

Last but not least there is a great choice of excellent food on the menu and the kitchen is open all day.

I will definitely return to Chakra Tavern next time I am in the area. üôèüèª
review 4:
Very nice place to stay a few nights in Bedugul.
Elena is a very nice person, she will help you make the best of your stay in this area.
I definitely recommand !
review 5: I highly recommend having a stay at Chakra Tavern- the area is absolutely beautiful, not so full with tourists like a lot of other areas and the hostel is walking distance from endless strawberry fields and beautiful botanical gardens! The weather here is a bit cooler so it‚Äôs a great place to get away from the heat- thanks to the amazing owner Elena the place really feels like a little home outside of home- super recommend a stay here!

name: Ayam Bakar Taliwang
address: Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
Ayam bakar taliwang + kangkung pelecing costs 75k..
A bit pricey and small portions, true.

But it was delicious!
Sour taste on kangkung and chewy chicken. Definitely worth to try!
review 2: Wonderful and authentic restaurant. just sitting there, relaxing, enjoying the food and watching the world go by.
review 3: Food was good. It was just the water problem they had ü§£ we couldn‚Äôt wash our hands properly.
review 4:
Descent place. Good food. Fair price.

Standing toilet and not like thisüöΩüòã
review 5:
Ridiculously expensive for the served portion. First impression was not so bad. You can see the Beratan lake from inside. However, the good impression stops there.

The chairs were too low compared to the table. It made the seating position uncomfortable. Then it took so long to bring out the food from the kitchen. It took more than 30 minutes from making the order until the first plate of food was served.

The food portion was so ridiculously small for the given price. The taste were not great as well. It is really hard to put anything positive about this restaurant. Not recommended at all.

name: Hotel Melati 1
address: Jl. Kebun Raya, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
The hotel was excellent and reasonably priced. We went there to stay overnight to breath the cool air of Bedugul. We're not too happy with the extremely loud sounds that came from the big mosque before dawn.
It wasn't there many many years ago when I was younger and still living there.
A pity. Nice cool clean air. But polluted with that loud sound.
Will go there again but won't stay overnight.
Hopefully local pemda will do something about it.
review 2: Quite good condition of room for budget but toilet was too bad
review 3: Good and cheap hotel, stratehis place for stay, friendly staff, and simple.
review 4: Its room is good, but the toilet is bad
review 5: cheap hotel, recomended for you traveler and backpacker

name: Rumah Containers
address: Jl. Kebun Raya Jl. Raya Bedugul No.19, Candikuning, Bedugul, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
5 minutes to ulun danu beratan.
Some local food restaurants nearby or you can cook your own meal.

Everything was okay, except there‚Äôs one side of the container door can‚Äôt close properly. That caused fly and mosquito coming in.
review 2:
I was very interested to see what a container home was like and I was very impressed. Great alternative to other brick and mortar types of villas. Very suitable for the cooler climate here at Bedugul. Heaps of room for extended family with self catering kitchen, two bathrooms, TV, WiFi, lots of outdoor entertaining areas and sun deck. Lovely semi rural location with fabulous mountain views and beautiful and exotic gardens. So many beautiful flowers here. The lakes are just minutes drive away as is the botanical gardens and forest. So much to see here. The best part of our stay was meeting the proprietor Lucia and her staff. Lovely people who made us feel very welcome.
Top marks, Lucia.
review 3: Absolutely wonderful location away from all the madness. Unique accommodation but nothing is too much trouble for Lusia and her team. Can sleep 6 easily. We enjoyed the room service, the amazing Home Care (in your accommodation) massage...$AUD16 for 1.5hrs incl head  foot and whole body massage. Close to markets, walking distance to Botanical Gardens, close drive to Handara Golf Course and Resort...spectacular and surrounded by mountains and hills and up the road to wild monkeys and Ulun Dano oldest temple in Bali on the lake. Visited a few lakes around here with fabulous views. Got to go to Eat Drink Love cafe in the market area in Bedugul...free wifi, great food and you can play your own music too. Surrounded by gorgeous flowers everywhere at the accommodation. Just do it...book and you won't be disappointed.
review 4: I really enjoyed my stay here, the place is a few containers  built on top of eachother wgicgh is great if you have a large family, the space is really cute and the decor is really well thought out. I love the double roof tops. I feel like this is probably the most unique house around the bedugal area. It's different than most places in Bali and is an experience in itself.
review 5: The place is very beautiful and im so comfortable stay few days at Rumah Containers. Location is perfect. Close to botanical garden and the iconic and famous ‚ÄúPure Ulun Danu‚Äù. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Definitely will come back again when i come to Bedugul.

name: Rumah Makan Taliwang Rinjani
address: Jl. Baturiti Bedugul No.19, Batunya, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: Decent food but really tiny bird served as the 'original' taliwang and as usual, they cook the chicken til it's beyond dry. But really enjoyed the fragrant veg urap and it almost saved the whole meal!
review 2: Local restaurant for local prices. Good meals üòäüôè

name: Ananda Resturant
address: P586+RVG, Jl. Baturiti Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia

name: Eat Drink Love Cafe Bedugul
address: Traditional Market, Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: Love their atmosphere. I'm a big fan of arts and crafts and this place has it all. You can also purchase these crafts if you want. It's an absolute hidden gem in the corner of Bedugul market. I love their camomile tea and cafe latte whenever I visit. Came here regularly twice a month just because I miss this place more than the lake. Cute place, the bartenders (a guy and a lovely lady with the hijab) are extremely friendly. My favourite spot will be on the second floor where the two couches are the best way to chill and sip your warm drink during cold evening.
review 2: A great place for stop. Hot chocolate and also black coffee to drink. Inspirational decoration also.
review 3: Best coffee at this part of Bali, very funny styling of the whole place. Staff is friendly and very happy to see you. It is great relax compared to buzzy market next door where everyone is trying to sell you something. Highly recommended to just chill out here and chat with owners. Enjoy
review 4: Food was excellent! Everything is home cooked right when you order it! Would totally recommend!
review 5: HIi everyone,, we are re open again now,, EAT DRINK LOVE,, more funky, more cozy,more yummy and more love,,please come back for complimentary drink, just mentioned my name,, LUSIA for free drink,, looking forward to see you all, GOD BLESS,,much love

name: Warung Muslim Sate Kelinci Ponorogo
address: dalam pasar mertasari, Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
Sate kelinci + gulai kambing + nasi + teh botol costs 38k

It was delicious!
Can't exactly tell the different between rabbit meat and other meats..
review 2: Attention! Food Poisening!! After eating there  me and my Girlfriend were 2 Days ill. Food was not good too.
review 3: they have the best soto ayam.

name: Penginapan "Citra Ayu"
address: Jl. Kebun Raya No.10, Batunya, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: Grear stay! We didn't book anything and checked several hotels before, they were so bad, with open holes in the walls and very cold. We stoped here and were impressed. It was the only place that we entered that smelled clean! Just wonderfull. The lady in charge is so nice! The price was unbelievable, 150k, and for our surprise it included a simple breakfast ;) very happy with this place ;)

name: Roti Bedugul
address: P597+52R, Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: Cozy little place nestled in the heart of Bedugul. It occupied little corner next to the busy Bedugul market. The lady owner is very warm and friendly. She will passionately offer you different cookies sample to try. The meat pies are excellent and have all the homemade qualities checked. Going to Bedugul is not complete without paying homage to this quaint bakery. It's like visiting your grandma who bakes.
review 2: Cookies are delicious. Can test all the different types before deciding which to buy.
review 3: Incredibly friendly owner studied in Australia. 35k pies are her specialty and it's showed! On a very quiet day in Candikunning this was the only place full for good reason
review 4: Found this small bakery while out on an evening stroll in Bedugul. They had the most delicious butter cookies, light as air. Regret not buying more boxes of it after we left the place. So amazing!!
review 5: Stumbled upon this little gem, great bread, pastries and amazing pies and fresh juice

name: B'Duur Camping Bedugul
address: Jl. Wortel No.II, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia

name: Rosela bedugul
address: P586+G6M, Jl. Kebun Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia

name: Ashram Hotel
address: P597+9VH, Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 80224, Indonesia
review 1: Cozy houses and fantastic garden. Price are not high. Highly recommend.

name: Ayudia Camp
address: Jl. Baturiti Bedugul No.19, Batunya, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1: This camp is a great place. They offer such a beautiful view. We can see hills and other panoramas around. The room is excelent. This place needs attention they actually deserves. Love it.
review 2: it's a good choice to stay around Bedugul and Family friendly. You can try camping on the ground with kids.

name: Mahavira Buddhist Temple
address: P579+M3H, Jl. Baturiti Bedugul, Batunya, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali 82191, Indonesia
review 1:
Mahayana Buddhist temple in Bedugul

The Buddhist temple is visible from the main road on the way to Bedugul. White Buddha statues lined up at the front of the temple. The temple houses three large Buddha statues, gift from Thailand, which follows the Nalanda style. Unlike the name, Vihara Mahavira Grand View", this place has no good view. The place are not well maintained.
review 2: Kinda disappointing, the service at the DVD shop was appalling. My DVD of Season 2 of My Name is Earl was actually just repeats of season 1. 4/10 Would Not Bang

name: Kost
address: P566+VRC Agro, Jl. Bukit Catu Jl. Raya Bedugul, Candikuning, Kec. Baturiti, Kabupaten Tabanan, Bali, Indonesia
